name: Guild Wars 2
description:
This is a special build based on GW2 player ArmoredVehicle's custom WINE build that is uploaded to the Guild Wars 2 Forums:

https://en-forum.guildwars2.com/discussion/31192/playing-guild-wars-2-on-linux-performance-optimizations-and-more/p1

An SSD is strongly recommended for improved performance.
notes: This installer is customized for AMD/Intel users. For NVidia users, please use the Armored NVidia installer
content:
files:
- client: https://s3.amazonaws.com/gw2cdn/client/branches/Gw2Setup-64.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: -maploadinfo
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Guild Wars 2/GW2-64.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating win64 prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3d9 dxgi
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Guild Wars 2"
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Guild Wars 2/GW2-64.exe
    src: client
system:
  disable_compositor: 'true'
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    MESA_GLSL_CACHE_DIR: $GAMEDIR
    MESA_GLSL_CACHE_DISABLE: 0
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    WINEDEBUG: -all
    mesa_glthread: true
    vblank_mode: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    d3d9: native
    nvapi: disabled
    nvapi64: disabled
